document.full_text: minneapolis federal reserve bank president narayana kocherlakota on wednesday repeated his call for a half-percentage-point interest rate hike by year-end, lending his weight to what still appears to be a minority view at the u.s. central bank.
document.title: fed should "ease up on gas" in 2011: kocherlakota
lines_and_colors: minneapolis federal reserve bank president narayana kocherlakota on wednesday repeated his call for a half-percentage-point interest rate hike by year-end, lending his weight to what still appears to be a minority view at the u.s. central bank.
